entries.journal_entry_description: Protect Rebel Alliance pilots as they complete the loading of GR-75 Medium Transports and finalize the evacuation of Echo Base on Hoth.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Protect the Rebel Alliance pilots who are loading Transport One with supplies. When loaded, it will launch and escape Hoth.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Protect Rebel Pilots Loading Transport One
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Protect the Rebel Alliance pilots who are loading Transport Two with supplies. When loaded, it will launch and escape Hoth.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Protect Rebel Pilots Loading Transport Two
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Protect the Rebel Alliance pilots who are loading Transport Three with supplies. When loaded, it will launch and escape Hoth.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Protect Rebel Pilots Loading Transport Three
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Protect the Rebel Alliance pilots who are loading Transport Four with supplies. When loaded, it will launch and escape Hoth.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Protect Rebel Pilots Loading Transport Four
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Protect the Rebel Alliance pilots who are loading Transport Five with supplies. When loaded, it will launch and escape Hoth.
entries.task05_journal_entry_title: Protect Rebel Pilots Loading Transport Five
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: For a Minor Victory, ensure that at least 1 transport makes it away from Echo Base safely.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: A second transport must escape destruction by Imperial troops.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: A third transport must escape. Don't let up!
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: A fourth transport must escape. You can do it!
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: For a Flawless Victory and exemplary service to the Rebel Alliance, ensure that a total of 5 transports make it away from Echo Base safely. There is only 1 more...protect it and ensure it gets away safely.
entries.task10_journal_entry_title: Flawless Victory: All 5 Transports Safely Away
